title: [综合]VeryDangerousNether —— 给你的地狱添加新的生物，让地狱充满难度[1.15]
author: MC小库
txt_content:
本帖最后由 MC小库 于 2020-3-25 15:39 编辑 
VeryDangerousNether
极度危险的地狱
插件搬运授权





QQ截图20200324222843.png (57.2 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

搬运授权
2020-3-24 22:29 上传






插件简介和特点1.此插件为地狱添加了各种新要素
2.增加了8种自定义生物，支持自定义生物名称
3.增加了地狱的音效（可在配置文件配置中）
4.增加了地狱风格的草和珊瑚
5.配置简单容易上手
插件截图原作者没有上传图片，以下图片进入楼主亲测





QQ截图20200325131014.png (293.17 KB, 下载次数: 0)

插件配置文件#+++++++++++++++++
#+  N E T H E R  +
#+  C O N F I G  +
#+++++++++++++++++

nm-enabled: true

#Enable different additions in nether
enable_ambient_sounds: true
enable_better_fire: true
nether_lightning: true
soulsand_slowness: true
netherrack_fires: true
enable_custom_mobs: true
enable_mean_ghasts: true
enable_lava_burns: true
enable_lava_placement: true
enable_lava_spouts: true
enable_falling_nether: true
enable_nether_structures: true
enable_alpha_pigman_sword_drop: true
wither_potion_drops: true
haste_potion_drops: true
extended_wither_boss: false
enderman_growl_replace_enderdragon_growl: false

#Spawn rate/percentage chances
lightning_chance: 5
netherack_melting_chance: 3
netherrack_fire_chance: 10
mob_spawn_chance: 100
falling_nether_chance: 1
alpha_pigman_sword_drop_chance: 1
wind_volume: 800 #-lower equals louder
wind_pitch: 0 #-must be between 0 and 2
low_y_value_wind: 70
high_y_value_wind: 200
netherrack_step_sound: ENTITY_SLIME_SQUISH
wither_potion_drop_chance: 2
haste_potion_drop_chance: 2

#Structure spawn rate/percentage chance
all_structures_chance: 65
web_vine_chance: 50
mushroom_chance: 35
nether_spike_chance: 60
nether_world_height: 120
coral_chance: 60
rose_chance: 60
mushrooms_chance: 35
replace_netherrack_chance: 50

#Enable custom mobs
spawn_molten: true
spawn_fireball: true
spawn_inferno: true
spawn_old Shadow: true
spawn_sherogath: true
spawn_sadness: true
spawn_necromancer: true
spawn_alpha_pigman: true

#Choose custom mob names
molten: 'Molten'
fireball: 'Fireball'
inferno: 'Inferno'
old_shadow: 'Old Shadow'
sherogath: 'Sherogath'
sadness: 'Sadness'
necromancer: 'Necromancer'
alpha_pigman: 'Alpha Pigman'

#List of worlds the plugin is enabled in
'enabled_worlds':
  - world_nether
复制代码
插件下载插件无命令及权限
支持作者，请到原贴下载：
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/very-dangerous-nether.76333/
